titles.title: Tax Rate Reduction Act of 1999
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the 15 and 28 percent individual income tax rates to 10 and 23 percent over a 10 year period.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/15/1999--Introduced. Tax Rate Reduction Act of 1999 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the 15 and 28 percent individual income tax rates to 10 and 23 percent over a ten-year period.
